author: umut@us.ibm.com
msg: Instrument the javascript to include a session key in each gap url call inside the user credentials field.

author: umut@us.ibm.com
msg: Diagnostic log message for unauthorized PhoneGap calls from within an iframe.

author: umut@us.ibm.com
msg: Instrument the gap:// url to include a session key which is created by the PhoneGap at the start of the app. Any third party site will not have access to this value, hence will not be able to issue PhoneGap calls

author: umut@us.ibm.com
msg: Simplify the prefix length computation and make it self documenting.
